text: @bbclaurak WHAT THE HELL DIFFERENCE DOES THAT MAKE????? He was keen to spread the virus and that coming from a member of Sage and a government advisor involved in the Covid-19 situation is NOT GOOD ENOUGH!! Stop slime balling for him! Get some backbone Laura!
